The journey of a software craftsman

  • blog
  • about

Hi, my name is Terence Lee. I’m a graduate from Johns Hopkins University in the field of Computer Science, class of 2007. I currently reside in Austin, TX working for the consulting company CapitalThought. I spend most of my free time either hacking away in ruby, playing games on my ps3/pc, running, or spending time with my girlfriend.

This blog is mostly about my technical adventures with ruby, heroku, pivotaltracker, and other workflow ideas.
